title: Servers
body: I just lost a ranked game including LP because I disconnected and couldn't move or do anything, I had normal ping my internet was working properly and everything else was in order. Fix this please

replies.body: Same things happening to me as well. I got kicked out of the game, now I'm stuck in the reconnect menu.... help?

I had the same problem in an ARAM just now. The screen displayed the 'attempting to reconnect' while I could see everyone around me moving as normal. I did have unusually high ping. It was fixed for about five minutes after leaving the game then reconnecting, but the issue kept coming back.

>Fix this please

What do you mean by that? Fix the servers, fix your profile score, fix what exactly?
